CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Administrative proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an application with ORG ( PERSON za restituciju nepokretnosti ) in Berane requesting restitution of the property expropriated from his father in DATE .

CARDINAL . Following the adoption of a new LAW ( Zakon o povraćaju oduzetih imovinskih prava i obeštećenju ) , on DATE , the applicant submitted another application to the newly established ORG in Berane ( PERSON za povraćaj oduzetih imovinskih prava i obeštećenja ) requesting compensation .

CARDINAL . In DATE all the Commissions for Restitution and Compensation were consolidated into CARDINAL regional Commissions in Bar , PERSON and GPE . Due to the location of the expropriated property , the applicant ’s request was assigned to the Commission with its seat in PERSON ( hereinafter “ the Commission ” ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant sought opinion from an independent expert regarding the expropriated property .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG also requested an assessment report on the expropriated property . The report was submitted to the ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . Due to Commission ’s inactivity , on DATE the applicant lodged an appeal ( žalba PERSON ćutanja uprave ) with ORG ( ORG za žalbe u postupku za povraćaj imovinskog prava ili obeštećenja ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the applicant filed complaints with ORG and ORG , respectively , about ORG inactivity .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the ORG to decide on the applicant ’s request within DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Commission ruled against the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld that decision on appeal .
CARDINAL . The applicant filed and action with ORG seeking redress .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s claim as unfounded . This decision was served on the applicant on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a constitutional appeal . On DATE ORG rejected his appeal for failure to make proper use of other available domestic remedies . According to ORG , the applicant should first have made use of an additional request for the judicial review of his case ( zahtjev za vanredno preispitivanje sudske odluke ) .
